codes.AC01: Account number provided in the request is invalid or missing.
codes.AG01: Transaction forbidden on this type of account (Payment cannot be made to this account for example not open for deposits, blocked, closed).
codes.AGNT: Agent identification provided in the request is incorrect
codes.BNOR: PSP is not registered under this Scheme.
codes.DS28: Return following technical problems resulting in erroneous transaction.
codes.DUPL: Request is a duplicate of another request
codes.MS03: Reason has not been specified by agent.
codes.NORR: No response on request within timeframe.
codes.NR01: PSP not able to confirm details and no reason is stated.
codes.PI01: Account Owner Identification and Payment Account number do not match.
codes.PN01: Account Owner name and Payment Account number do not match.
codes.PN02: Account Owner name and Payment Account number is a close match.
codes.RC03: Debtor bank identifier is invalid or missing.
codes.RC04: Creditor bank identifier is invalid or missing.
codes.TM01: Associated message was received after agreed processing cut-off time.

description: Specifies the external verification reason code, as published in an external verification code set.
name: ExternalVerificationReason1Code
